section.p: A (perhaps artificial) grouping of encounters for administrative or financial purposes. There is no specific requirement that the encounters have anything particular in common.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
The unique identifier for the administrative grouping encounters.

Contains zero or more [0..*] encounter, where its type is Encounter Event
An interaction between a patient and a practitioner at a given location under the auspices of a given organization for the purpose of providing healthcare-related service(s).

Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id
The unique identifier for the administrative grouping encounters.

Contains zero or more [0..*] encounter, where its type is Encounter Event
An interaction between a patient and a practitioner at a given location under the auspices of a given organization for the purpose of providing healthcare-related service(s).
